examples: You nearly gave the game away in the other room.
I nearly fell asleep.
Losing his business nearly broke him.
Tom is nearly always the odd man out.
My mother nearly had kittens when I said I was going to buy a motorbike .
words.defineEn: in a manner that is close
words.defineVi: một cách gần gũi

examples: Our team actually won!
The mobile phone business was actually his bread and butter.
Actually, I wear several different hats.
It's actually an incredibly good deal!
Some of my patients are actually staring death in the face.
words.defineEn: used to emphasize a fact or the truth of a situation
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh một thực tế hoặc sự thật của một tình huống

examples: Our favorite restaurant has gone to the dogs lately.
There's a lot of police activity around here lately.
She's had a lot of time on her hands lately.
Lately, I've been dealing with constipation.
Alex has been really gloomy lately.
words.defineEn: not a long time ago
words.defineVi: cách đây không lâu

examples: Winter brings a peaceful silence, especially after a fresh snowfall.
The cranberry pie at the bakery is absolutely delicious, especially with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
Women especially, are known to wear so many different hats, when it comes to our work and home life.
She's got a lot on her plate - especially with two new projects starting this week.
I usually like to be the person who holds down the fort, especially at work.
words.defineEn: to an extent or degree that is greater than usual
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ hoặc mức độ lớn hơn bình thường

examples: The decorations were specially designed for the wedding reception.
He was specially awarded for his exceptional contributions to the organization.
A snake's organs are specially adapted to run along the inside of its body.
It was specially designed to look at some of the bigger things in the universe like clusters of galaxies.
The electrodes were specially designed to deliver small electrical currents to different regions of the visual cortex, activating the brain cells there.
words.defineEn: in a manner that emphasizes a particular aspect
words.defineVi: theo cách nhấn mạnh một khía cạnh cụ thể

examples: Will wonders ever cease?
Would wonders ever cease?
Nobody has ever made head or tail of Greek music.
Have you ever used this software before?
Have you ever looked a gift horse in the mouth?
words.defineEn: on any occasion; at any time
words.defineVi: vào bất kỳ dịp nào; bất cứ lúc nào

examples: The guy couldn't even harm a flea.
Even the experts took the painting for a genuine Van Gogh.
Some of his paintings never even saw the light of day.
A warm bowl of minestrone soup is even more comforting with a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese.
Don't even bother.
words.defineEn: despite what was mentioned
words.defineVi: mặc dù những gì đã được đề cập

examples: This disaster comes hard on the heels of last week’s train crash.
The kids always work hard at school.
For Walter, disaster followed hard on the heels of his initial success.
Life on the road can be very hard.
She worked hard toward her degree.
words.defineEn: needing a lot of skill or effort to do
words.defineVi: cần rất nhiều kỹ năng hoặc nỗ lực để làm

examples: After all, one case of the trots hardly spells disaster.
You hardly made a dent in your dinner.
There were hardly a few people in the audience.
Hardly anyone stands on ceremony.
These are hardly the bread-and-butter concerns of struggling farmers.
words.defineEn: close to none; almost not
words.defineVi: gần như không; hầu như không

words.defineEn: used to refer to the conclusion or outcome of a situation or event
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ kết luận hoặc kết quả của một tình huống hoặc sự kiện

examples: Memories of that day still bring a lump to his throat.
A major technological advancement like that is still light years away.
The child is still running a fever
Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
Our trip is still very much up in the air.
words.defineEn: up to now or the time stated
words.defineVi: cho đến bây giờ hoặc thời gian đã nêu

examples: Yet, for the moment anyway, the bankers have lost their Midas touch.
Has your headache gone yet?
Has the postman been yet?
His parents have not yet reached retirement age.
Yet another candidate has thrown his hat into the ring.
words.defineEn: up to a particular point in time
words.defineVi: đến một thời điểm cụ thể

words.defineEn: used to add extra information or a surprising, unexpected, or different truth
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thêm thông tin bổ sung hoặc một sự thật đáng ngạc nhiên, bất ngờ hoặc khác biệt

examples: These powers were eventually passed to municipalities.
The rumors eventually reached the President.
She eventually became a victim of her own success.
Eventually, he came face to face with discrimination again.
If you keep working so hard, the stress will eventually take its toll.
words.defineEn: after or at the end of a series of events or a long time
words.defineVi: sau hoặc khi kết thúc một chuỗi sự kiện hoặc một thời gian dài

examples: Ideally we want to ten or fifteen minutes.
Ideally, you're the same person.
Ideally avoid thinking about your unpaid bills, your relationship issues, the past, the future.
Of course, not all gases behave ideally, and all gases deviate from the law at low temperatures or high pressures.
Uh, I see myself ideally in LA.
words.defineEn: in a way that is perfect or most suitable
words.defineVi: theo cách hoàn hảo hoặc phù hợp nhất

examples: Basically, he was a bully, and like most bullies, he could dish it out, but couldn't take it.
The company wants to hire her at any cost, so she can basically take her pick of perks during the negotiation process.
Your grandmother will be there, and she is basically Mrs. Grundy!
The cast of 'Spring Awakening' was there, basically.
Drones date back much longer to early flight but like the modern drones basically trace their origin to the 80s.
words.defineEn: in the most important aspects with no regard to details of less importance
words.defineVi: trong các khía cạnh quan trọng nhất mà không quan tâm đến các chi tiết ít quan trọng hơn

examples: Apparently, Meg's cooking leaves a lot to be desired.
Apparently he's turned over a new leaf and he's not smoking any more.
Apparently the company had been in the red for some time before it went out of business.
Taxi apparently jammed the brake, but it still the van's fault for not keeping a safe distance.
They checked their inventory, but apparently they're fresh out of the blender that's on sale.
words.defineEn: based on what one has read or heard and therefore uncertain if it is really the case
words.defineVi: dựa trên những gì một người đã đọc hoặc nghe và do đó không chắc chắn nếu đó thực sự là trường hợp

examples: Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
He certainly earned his place in the sun.
Kramer has certainly won the respect of his peers.
I certainly learned my lesson about buying something from a stranger online.
America is certainly bigger than the sum of its parts.
words.defineEn: used to show that one completely agrees with something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để cho thấy rằng một người hoàn toàn đồng ý với một cái gì đó

examples: Such cheap goods obviously rely on dirt cheap labor.
Obviously, over the years, this changed but my car remained behind the times with its cassette player.
He obviously didn’t realize he was swimming with sharks!
I was furious but just left it at that since he obviously didn't care about me.
And obviously, tons of people mistake Twitter bots for humans all the time.
words.defineEn: in a way that is easily understandable or noticeable
words.defineVi: theo cách dễ hiểu hoặc đáng chú ý

examples: During February, the days gradually start getting longer as we move closer to spring.
After the CEO announced that she had been diagnosed with dementia, her daughter gradually began taking the reins of the company.
He used to be an important member of the team, but he's gradually drifted out of the picture.
The tension and excitement built gradually all day.
The sky gradually brightened as the morning sun rose.
words.defineEn: slowly and in small amounts over a long period of time; not suddenly
words.defineVi: chậm và với số lượng nhỏ trong một thời gian dài; không đột ngột

words.defineEn: at the same time as what is being stated
words.defineVi: đồng thời với những gì đang được nêu
